description: User database schema creation requires the RDS instance to be provisioned.
mitigation_plan: DevOps to provide connection details to Backend team as soon as RDS is available.

description: Registration service logic requires the User database schema to exist.
Frontend authentication flow depends on the backend JWT login mutation being implemented.
mitigation_plan: Define GraphQL schema early; frontend can develop against a mocked endpoint.

description: End-to-end testing of email verification requires the AWS SES integration to be functional.
mitigation_plan: Use a local mail-trapping tool like MailHog for initial testing before integrating with the live SES.
impact_if_delayed: Inability to fully validate the user registration lifecycle.

description: Profile service logic requires the profile-related database schemas to be in place.
impact_if_delayed: Profile feature backend development is blocked.
